name: simple_site
body:
### Quick Start.

Install the gem:

```
$ gem install simple_site
```

Add simple_site config to your Rakefile:

```
require 'rubygems'
require 'bundler/setup'
require 'simple_site'

SimpleSite::Tasks.new do |site|
  site.js_files = [
    'jquery-1.6.2.min.js',
    'custom.js'
  ]
  site.buckets = %w(www.myawesomesite.com)
end
```

Run some rake tasks!

```
$ rake -T
```
tagline: Helps build simple websites using haml and sass. Compresses your js. Deploys to AWS S3.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
